com.bandyer.android_sdk.call

Interface CallModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BandyerComponent, BandyerModule

    public CallModule
extends BandyerModule

    Module used for audio&video communication.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CallModule.DefaultImpls
      Module used for audio&video communication.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCallObserver(CallObserver observer)
      Observe the starting or ending event of a call. Remember to remove the observer or a leak will occur!
      void addCallObserver(androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity activity, CallObserver observer)
      Observe the starting or ending event of a call from an activity. The observer is automatically disposed when activity is destroyed.
      void addCallUIObserver(CallUIObserver observer)
      Observe the start or destroy event of an activity created for calls. Remember to remove the observer or a leak will occur!
      void addCallUIObserver(androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity activity, CallUIObserver observer)
      Observe the starting or destroy event of an activity created for calls. The observer is automatically disposed when activity is destroyed.

      • setVerified

        void setVerified(Call call,
                 boolean verified)

        This function allows the logged user to broadcast to other call participants that has been verified or not within the host app.

        Parameters:
        call - call to verify
        verified - true if the logged user has been verified, false otherwise.

      • setVerified

        void setVerified(java.lang.String callId,
                 boolean verified)

        This function allows the logged user to broadcast to other call participants that has been verified or not within the host app.

        Parameters:
        callId - call to verify
        verified - true if the logged user has been verified, false otherwise.

        Set the call UI display mode.

        Parameters:

        callDisplayMode - mode in which to display the call
